disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your Tiendanube store
disconnected.subtitle: Automatically send all your E-commerce Contacts and their purchase data to a Doppler List. Also you can import your store products in Email Templates and create Abandoned Cart and Retargeting Product Automations. Any questions? Press
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with your Tiendanube store please try again later.

connected.title: Synchronize data entities with Subscriber Lists
connected.subtitle_list_count: You currently have {{availableLists}} Lists. Be aware that you can sync Lists manually whenever you want.
connected.subtitle: Select the Tiendanube entity and the Doppler List you wish to synchronize. Contacts belonging to that entity will be automatically imported into the List.
connected.selected_list_subtitle: At this moment you have 1 List. Keep in mind that you can manually synchronize it any time you want.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: If you disconnect, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your Tiendanube account and the Automations associated with the integration will be paused. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Take benefit of the data from your contacts in other apps to expand your Doppler list. If you canâ€™t find the same field among the options you can personalize it or omit it.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! Be sure that the Email field is related to the same field at Doppler.

status.title: Your Tiendanube store is already connected to Doppler
status.subtitle: Your Contacts were integrated automatically from your store by the Doppler extension for Tiendanube. You can also import your products into Email Templates and create Abandoned Cart and Product Retargeting Automations. Any doubts? Press
